title: BITSA Tech Workshop 2024
desc: Join us for an exciting workshop on modern web development technologies including React, Node.js, and cloud deployment. Perfect for students looking to enhance their technical skills.

title: Networking Mixer
desc: Connect with industry professionals and fellow students at our monthly networking event. Great opportunity to build connections and learn about career opportunities in tech.

title: Hackathon 2024
desc: 24-hour coding challenge where teams compete to build innovative solutions. Prizes for best projects and special mentions for creative ideas. Open to all skill levels!

title: Guest Speaker: AI in Education
desc: Dr. Sarah Johnson from MIT will speak about the future of artificial intelligence in educational technology. Don't miss this insightful session!

title: Study Group Sessions
desc: Weekly study groups for BBIT, Software Engineering, and Networking students. Get help with coursework, share knowledge, and prepare for exams together.

title: Career Fair 2024
desc: Meet representatives from top tech companies. Learn about internship opportunities, job openings, and what employers look for in candidates.
